modName: Delani Sisters - Standalone Followers and Presets
summary: Rosa and Vivi are sisters, they are 27 and 21 years old bretons. They have a custom armor, custom weapons and a custom spell. Rosa can fight with 2 hand weapons and bows. Vivi is a spellsword, she is fighting with 1 hand weapons and magic. She also has a special spell, with that she can summon her dead twin sister Eve. (& RaceMenu Preset and Head)
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/vznn3939.jpg][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/vznn3939.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
[center][size=4]Delani Sisters - Standalone Followers and RaceMenu presets[/size][/center][center]
[youtube]JxvFiRUCbsY[/youtube]
Video : [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC83AFm_0z7e91dNgj782Gvg]Boxofbeer Channel[/url] Thx. ;)

Hello there. These is my third follower mod and i hope you enjoy it. ;)

Rosa and Vivi are sisters, they are 27 and 21 years old bretons.
They have a custom armor, custom weapons and a custom spell.

Rosa can fight with 2 hand weapons and bows.

Vivi is a spellsword, she ist fighting with 1 hand weapons and magic.
She also has a special spell, with that she can summon her dead twin sister Eve.
"The spell is also in Vivi´s inventory, so you can learn it to."

You can craft and upgrade the weapons at the forge and sharpening weel.

[url=http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/kjd4l83y.jpg][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/kjd4l83y.jpg[/img]
[/url][/center]Details:

Name: Rosa Delani
Age: 27
Race: Bretone
Level: 10 - 250
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]Protection: Essential[/size][/font]
Voice: Female Commander
Body: UNP / CBBE curvy. Optional: sevenbase / unpcm - HDT: unp, unpcm & sevenbase
High: 1.0
Weight: 100
Custom Armor: Ritter Armor. UNP & CBBE
Custom Weapons: Knights Templar Sword 2h, Colovian Composite Bow
Combat Style: 2h & Bow

[size=3]Location: Blue Palace[/size]

[center][url=http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/zifcei6v.jpg][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/zifcei6v.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
Name: Vivi Delani
Age: 21
Race: Bretone
Level: 10 - 250
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=2]Protection: Essential[/size][/font]
Voice: Female Even Toned
Body : UNP / CBBE curvy. Optional: sevenbase / unpcm - HDT: unp, unpcm & sevenbase
High: 0.97
Weight: 100
Custom Armor: Ritter Armor. UNP & CBBE
Custom Weapon: Knights Templar Sword 1h
Combat Style: 1h & Magic
Custom Spell: She has a special spell, with that she can summon her dead twin sister Eve.

[size=3]Location: Blue Palace[/size]

[center][url=http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/to5ki64y.jpg][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/to5ki64y.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
Vivi´s dead twin sister Eve Delani (summon spell)

Race: Bretone
Level: 1 - 250
Body: Same as Vivi
High: 0.96
Weight: 100
Armor: Vanilla hooded robe with custom stats.
Custom Weapon: Knights Templar Sword 1h
Combat Style: 1h & Magic

[center][url=http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/bw7hs3zu.jpg][img]http://fs5.directupload.net/images/170630/bw7hs3zu.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
INFO & CHANGE LOG

Version 1.0

Under optional files you can download the unpcm and 7B Orig. Body (non HDT & HDT) For the HDT bodys you need a compatible skeleton...
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url].


Version 1.1

Texture path fixed

edit: I have uploaded the version 1.1 again with the right bow texture path... sorry
[size=3]If you have allready installed the armor and weapon in your game, please do not overwrite your texture files.

Uploaded a new file under Miscellaneous...[/size]
Fixed the ghost problem that you get an testament if she died and fixed some issues with
the armor. Please overwrite the main file.

[size=3]Uploaded the RaceMenu presets & exported heads[/size].
[size=4]
----------------------------------------------------------------[/size]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty [/url]by Gabriel Mailhot as LogRaam

I hope i forgot nobody...

Tools:

Nifskope
Nifmerge
TES5Edit

enb: rudy enb

thx for these great mods. :)

and thx Skylaskyrim for the tutorial. :)
